description: Variation of condition 25 (Completion of remediation scheme) and variation of condition 29 (noise mitigation) and variation of condition 30 (Mitigation of noise from commercial plant and machinery) of planning permission PP/2011/4250 dated 08/03/2013 for the development of site to provide a part four (4), part ten (10), part twelve (12), part fourteen (14), part eighteen-storey (18) building, plus basement, comprising 673 square metres of commercial floor space for flexible use for shops (within Use Class A1), Financial and Professional Services (Use Class A2), Restaurants and Cafes (Use Class A3), Hot Food Takeaway (Use Class A5), Business (Use Class B1) or non-residential Institution (Use Class D1) and 151 residential units above (83 x 1-bedroom, 65 x 2-bedroom and 3 x 3 bedroom flats); together with alterations to the existing access and provision of 30 car parking spaces (15 to a disabled standard) and 169 cycle storage spaces at basement level (Outline Planning Application -  Access, Layout and Scale being sought and Appearance and Landscaping matters to be reserved).Variation to condition 25 to provide for rewording of the condition to require the trigger of the condition to be pre-occupation and variation of condition 29 and 30 to provide for the rewording to require the trigger of the condition to be six (6) months from the commencement of development.
